title: Train fault causing travel time delays on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线列车故障导致行程时间延迟
title_translations.ms: Gangguan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan masa perjalanan di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் பயண நேர தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் தவறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Free regular bus services have ceased.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 20 mins additional travel time from #PasirRis towards #PayaLebar. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 40 mins travel time from #PasirRis to #PayaLebar,due to a train fault near #TanahMerah. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 20mins travel time from #PasirRis to #PayaLebar towards #JooKoon. Train service is still available.
